name: Jump Game – Finger Jump
description:
To reach higher!

- Compete with your friends and see who can reach the highest
- Simple & easy to play game for everyone!
- Various characters for more fun and all these are for free!

Finger Jump - Features
- Simple and free
- Attractive characters with high quality graphics.
- Fancy combo effects and animation
- Tons of Jump booster items such as Spring Board, Shield, Dice and more.
- See who can reach higher with the Rank System.
- Offline play available. – No WIFI required!

Finger Jump - How to play
- Very simple! Tap screen to jump.

Finger Jump - Rules
- Tap to Jump!
- Reach as high as you can within the time limit.
- Various items will help you jump better and reach higher.
- Collect combos and experience the cool Super Jump!
- Compete against your friends and see who can reach higher!

Enjoy Finger Jump
Wish you the best luck!
